reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, particularly in hot weather, and appreciate its fit that falls below the knee. The dress receives positive feedback for its style, with one customer noting it's perfect for weddings, and its flattering waistline and soft material. Customers like the pockets, with one mentioning they're hidden and don't make hips look huge. The fabric thickness receives mixed reviews, with some customers describing it as good while others find it very thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: I loved this dress and so did everyone else. Wore it to my husbands military pinning ceremony. I could wear this dress casually or dress it up. It’s very comfortable and flowy. The quality of the dress is good and the fit was good. Read more
items.author: Anna the Banana & V

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress!
items.body: Cute dress. I am 5'6", 34" bust, and weigh 120-125 lbs. I ordered a medium and it fits great. The length is down to the middle of my kneecap. There are no weird puffs or gaping around the bust line. The colors and print match those in the photograph. The material is soft and somewhat stretchy and hangs nicely. Read more
items.author: melissa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: Cute dress, but not what I expected. I wanted one that fit at my natural waistline, but this fit more like an empire waist. I'm large busted, so that might have been part of the problem, even though I ordered by bust size. The material is quite soft, but thin. I'm not sure how long it will hold up to repeated washings, but for the price it's fine. It's certainly easy care, and the skirt flows nicely. While the fabric isn't overly sturdy, it is opaque. Nice dress, but be aware of the difference in fit if you have big boobs. Read more
items.author: Fargo Shopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wore it right out of the package!
items.body: I'm 5'4" and curvy. The dress flows perfectly on my curves and the waist is right at my belly button to hide any unwanted curves. It hit right at the knees which is the perfect length for me. No steaming needed and true to color. I ordered the navy blue. If you're looking for a comfy flattering dress, this is it! You can dress it up or down and it's very breathable. I haven't washed it yet but I'm hoping it holds up. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable dress
items.body: Very nice and comfortable Stretchable fit Has pockets too Read more
items.author: Joan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress, size up…
items.body: Cute dress. Runs small, should size up. Color was a beautiful blue and length was right above the knee. Read more
items.author: gma2007

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Bought this for summer - material is lightweight but not see thru. Front fits nicely. Length was perfect for me 5'3" came below my knees by a few inches. very comfortable. Read more
items.author: diamond girl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: Bought in navy blue. Good feeling fabric. Flattering fit. V neck lays flat and isn’t flappy or too low. Easy to dress it up or down. Having thinner fabric made it a little difficult to iron, so I would probably steam it next time. I also wore a short slip just in case since fabric isn’t thick. Overall, happy with the purchase! Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 01 Sketch Black White, Mix Blue, Blue White Floral, White Lily, Butterfly Black, White Dot Red, Abstract Flowers, Sunflower White, Daisy Blue, 01 White Flower Black, Gypsophila Black, Colorful Floral Blue, Green Leaf Yellow, Floral Hibiscus. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
